entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: -0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: W 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with freezing rain or rain beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Windy. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
